resources.string: 8:00am - 5k/10k, Team Relay and Dual Challenge (which begins with 5k run and then bike transition).
SEPTEMBER 15 AT CHAINWHEEL DRIVE 1770 DREW ST. CLEARWATER
FRIDAY, SEPTEMBER 16 AT COACHMAN PARK FROM 11:00 TO 1:00PM, 301 DREW STREET, CLEARWATER
SATURDAY, SEPTEMBER 17 STARTING AT 6:30AM AT COACHMAN PARK, 301 DREW STREET CLEARWATER
Through our work, we aim to raise awareness and funds for brain cancer research while helping those suffering with a brain tumor have a better quality of life.
